node.title: Covid-19: Two cases discovered at Gisborne intermediate school
node.description: Two students who go to Ilminister Intermediate, in the Gisborne suburb of Kaiti, have returned positive results.
node.content:
["New cases of Covid-19 have been discovered at an intermediate school in Gisborne.", "", "
Two school children and a member of their household in Gisborne have tested positive for Covid-19. Photo: RNZ / Tom Kitchin
", "Two students who go to Ilminister Intermediate, in the suburb of Kaiti, have returned positive results.", "Another person in their household has also tested positive.", "Classmates of the two students have been asked to stay home today to reduce any potential spread.", "The rest of the school is open as normal.", "Hauora Tairāwhiti chief executive Jim Green said work was in full swing to identify close contacts of the cases and locations of interest.", ""I understand parents may feel anxious but students should continue to attend school unless contacted by the school or public health staff," he said in a statement.", ""The advice remains for everyone in Tairāwhiti that if you have any symptoms at all, please get tested today and self-isolate at home until you've received a negative result.", ""Drive-through testing is available at te Tini o Porou at 75 Huxley Road from 2pm to 4pm today and Watson Park until midday.", ""Testing is also available through your local GP or at Te Puia Hospital. Please ring first to book a time. For anyone who is getting tested, please help us to speed up testing by having your NHI number with you if you have access to it."", "Another new case of Covid-19 was announced in Tairāwhiti yesterday evening.", "The region now has at least 21 cases, nine of them confirmed as Omicron. Only one is confirmed as Delta."]
